Text:
Do you have more Iron Maiden vinyls/CDs?

Pls upload some their music, I really appreciate this.

Up the irons m/
Wow man, you are on fire! Great choices of music, crisp and dynamic rips - thank you so much!! Do you have some Ryan Adams/Mercury Rev? That would be awesome! Much respect.

Try these:

 Iron Maiden - Piece of Mind (1983) [24 bit FLAC] vinyl
https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8296791

 Iron Maiden - Powerslave (1984) [24 bit FLAC] vinyl
https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8296807


@pebh thanks for the kind words.  If I come across any RA or Mercury Rev I will up it.

I've got to agree w/ @pebh, these Maiden rips have a great sound to them, great dynamics and mastering, but there's an insane amount of distortion. 

Was this somehow caused post-rip or is this present when played on your turntable? Have the records been cleaned properly before being ripped?

Thanks, nonetheless!
With Heavy Metal, there's always distortion. Just be thankful there is not overbearing hiss and pop like many other vinyl rips of Maiden
